title: BUSINESS_HOURS_ADD
description: Adds a time interval to a starting Datetime, counting only business hours. The result is returned in GMT.

parameters.name: interval_milliseconds
parameters.description: The interval to add, specified in milliseconds.

parameters.name: business_hours_name_optional
parameters.description: The name of the business hours. If omitted, the default schedule is applied.

examples:
BUSINESS_HOURS_ADD(CreatedDate, 8 * 60 * 60 * 1000)
-- Returns a Datetime 8 business hours after CreatedDate.

BUSINESS_HOURS_ADD(ClosedDate, -5 * 8 * 60 * 60 * 1000, "Weekday9to5" )
-- Returns a Datetime 5 business days before ClosedDate using "Weekday9to5" hours.
